title: Border, 1500–50
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: grid of withdrawn element work with needle lace, reticella style
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Single band composed of geometric motifs in alternating repeat pattern bordered by small triangular pendants.
